title: How to Get Stronger Nails Using Petroleum Jelly

steps.headline: Wash your hands.
steps.description: Not just rinse, actually wash them. This is the first step to the road of stronger nails.

steps.headline: Don't skimp on the petroleum jelly!
steps.description: Put a big ol' glob on all your nails!

steps.headline: Rub, rub, rub!
steps.description: Use your index finger to rub all that petroleum jelly around. Pay special attention to these areas: Cuticles, and where you find those pesky hangnails!

steps.headline: Leave on for 3-5 minutes.
steps.description: This leaves time to let the petroleum jelly soak in and gets its full strengthening power!

steps.headline: Rinse.
steps.description: Make sure you get ALL of the petroleum jelly off.

text: Wash your hands. Not just rinse, actually wash them. This is the first step to the road of stronger nails. Don't skimp on the petroleum jelly! Put a big ol' glob on all your nails! Rub, rub, rub! Use your index finger to rub all that petroleum jelly around. Pay special attention to these areas: Cuticles, and where you find those pesky hangnails! Leave on for 3-5 minutes. This leaves time to let the petroleum jelly soak in and gets its full strengthening power! Rinse. Make sure you get ALL of the petroleum jelly off. Enjoy!

Make sure you get ALL of the petroleum jelly off.
